channel.title: The art of Emanuel Feuermann
channel.description:
Series exploring artistry of cellist Emanuel Feuermann, including historic recordings. The series is hosted by Seymour Itzkoff of Smith College.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Schubert and Dohnanyi, part1
item.description: Schubert: Piano Trio in B-flat, Op. 99 (with Heifetz and Rubinstein); Dohnanyi: Serenade in C (with Heifetz and Primrose)
item.dc:creator: Itzkoff, Seymour W.
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts
